name: Memory (Standalone from Simon Quest's Transylvania Adventure)
name_original: Memory (Standalone from Simon Quest's Transylvania Adventure)
description:
Memory minigame from Simon Quest's Transylvania Adventure, ported to webGL with added mouse controls.

Note: This was tested with Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge, and results may vary depending on your browser! This was ported for fun and will not receive updates/bugfixes.
